title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 197.4 - License renewal application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 197.4 - License renewal application

State Regulations

In order to renew a license to guide, the holder must submit
to the department: (a) a completed
renewal application, which will be supplied by the department; (b) a completed physician's statement of
physical condition, which was signed and dated no more than 30 days prior to
submission with the application; (c) current American Red Cross standard first
aid certificate, or equivalent; (d) current American Red Cross CPR certificate or equivalent; and
(e) the appropriate license renewal
fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
197.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
